{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Xr700 Hero Image.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = Nighthawk Pro Gaming Router |caption2 = 802.11ac Quad-Stream Wave2 Wi-Fi plus 802.11ad |pp = https://www.netgear.com/npg/xr700/ |sp = https://www.netgear.com/support/product/XR700 |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = Supported |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Netgear |model = XR700 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = -100NAS |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 08/31/2018 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Netgear_XR700 |wlclass = AD7200 |series = Nighthawk Pro Gaming |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = PY316200339,PPD-QCA9008-SBD1,PY317400405 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Annapurna Labs;Alpine AL-514; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A15 |cpu1spd = 1.7 GHz <!-- 1.7GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Spansion;S34ML04G200TF100; |flash1size = 512 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5CC256M16DP-DI; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA8337N; |sw1chip = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA8337N; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = <!-- 10MbE,100MbE,1GbE, --> |lan_ports = 6 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = IEEE 802.3/3u/3ab |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = B0:B9:8A |oui = B0:B9:8A
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = CFE;;; |stockos = Linux;;DumaOS;
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0, SFP+, M.2 |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = 1 |exp_M.2 = 1 |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 19 |pwr_amp_dc = 3.16 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Wave2, MU-MIMO, WiGig, VHT160, 256QAM, DFS, LACP, SFP+ (10GbE), |addchip = 2.4GHz RF Power Amplifier Module;Skyworks;SE2623L;;4; ,,, 5GHz RF Power Amplifier Module;RFMD;RFPA5542;;4; ,,, 2-port USB 3.0 PCIe Controller;ASMedia;ASM1024A;;1; ,,, 1x2 PCIe Packet Switch;ASMedia;ASM1182e;;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac+ad
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = password |defaultssid = NETGEARXX |defaultssid_regex = ^NETGEAR[0-9]{2}$ |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = [https://github.com/masmbit/Netgear-R9000-Build/tree/master/bin OpenWrt]
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 09/23/2016 |estreldate = 09/29/2016 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B07GZYSJDZ |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9984; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = MHF4 |rad1txchains = 4 |rad1rxchains = 4 |rad1sstreams = 4 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |acqam1 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad1ac = 1733 |rad1n = 600 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9984; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = MHF4 |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 4 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam2 = 800 |rad2n = 600 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4
|rad3mod = Qualcomm Atheros QCA9008-SBD1 |rad3modif = M.2 (1216) |rad3chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9500; |rad3oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad3_ant_conn = MHF4 |rad3txchains = 1 |rad3rxchains = 1 |rad3sstreams = 1 |rad3stand = IEEE 802.11ad |rad3ad = 4620 |rad3freq = 60
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== This XR700 is assumed to be internally identical to the [[Netgear R9000]] :so most details are copied from there.
{{see also|Netgear R9000|Netgear|Annapurna Labs}}
==Links of Interest== ===Forum threads=== *[https://forum.openwrt.org/t/netgear-x10-r9000/3913/741 ''Netgear XR700'' on '''OpenWRT''']
